meanings.definition: A hot drink made from wine, sugar, lemon, and spices.
meanings.sent1: During the winter, my grandmother always makes a comforting negus for us to enjoy.
meanings.sent2: At the holiday party, guests sipped on warm negus to stay cozy.
meanings.sent3: The negus was so delicious that it warmed both our bodies and our hearts.
meanings.sent4: The negus danced on my taste buds like a symphony of flavors.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the steaming negus filled the room, inviting everyone to take a sip.

meanings.sent1: The negus of Ethiopia was respected by all the people in the kingdom.
meanings.sent2: The negus wore a crown adorned with precious jewels.
meanings.sent3: The young prince jokingly referred to his father as the 'negus of the household'.
meanings.sent4: The negus stood tall and proud, a symbol of strength and leadership.
meanings.sent5: The negus's presence commanded attention and admiration from all around.

meanings.sent1: The vineyard was known for its sweet negus grapes that made delicious wine.
meanings.sent2: The negus grapes were carefully harvested to ensure the best quality.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel in the garden loved to steal the ripe negus grapes.
meanings.sent4: The negus grapes glistened in the sunlight, tempting all who passed by.
meanings.sent5: With each bite, the juicy negus grape burst with flavor, delighting the taste buds.
